name: Sweet Dreams (Rhia_a)
description:
Play as Mr. Vincent Fox in this 2D game to deliver cakes to the tables before the grand opening of his bakery, Sweet Dreams! You'll need to hurry because the bakery opens soon!

Hey so this is my first independent game ever! I wanted to make this to not only learn more about game design, but to also showcase my passion for games.  I hope to use this cute little game to highlight my growth as a designer as I progress throughout college.  

My dream to make something that betters the world and is something other people can enjoy. Thanks for playing!

*Also checkout my page to play the game my team and I made for the BLM Game Jam!
